member.name: T:Presto.IPrestoModule
member.summary: All modules that plug in to Presto must have one and only one class that implements the IPrestoModule interface. This interface serves as the starting point for execution and will be instantiated upon execution of the module.

member.name: M:Presto.IPrestoModule.load
member.summary: After a new instance of the module is created. The load method is immediately called to begin processing.

member.name: M:Presto.IPrestoModule.unload
member.summary: After the module has finished executing, the unload method gets called to allow the module to clean up behind itself before being destroyed.
